name: Eldritch Abyss
description:
Eldritch Abyss is a “freemium”, 3D isometric mobile game, with a low poly, blocky art style, featuring heavy cosmic horror themes. 

Utilising touch input (click and drag on PC), the player controls a character who wakes up lost in an abyssal labyrinth, and must walk a crafted path amongst the void defeating whatever freakish beasts lay ahead. Gaining experience and "Abyssal Shards" that will aid them by increasing their power and equipment.
